title: Pygmy Staff
info: The Pygmy Staff is a ground ranged post-Plantera Hardmode summon weapon. It spawns a pygmy minion that follows the player and attacks enemies via a ranged spear attack. Like other minions, the summoned pygmy is invincible and follows the player for an unlimited amount of time, unless the player dies, summons a replacement minion, or cancels the buff. The Pygmy Staff is dropped by Plantera with a 25% (1/4) / 50% (1/2) chance.
